content.rendered:
The list is back for year 6! that’s right, Community Events, Salesforce events, big Partner events, track them all in ONE PLACE! Below is the Google Sheet for Salesforce Community Events 2023 and will keep on updating it as more info is shared. If you have an event you want to add to the list (I try to aggregate them best I can from across the community but I know I’m not perfect) use the events for here.

you cam also add the Google calendar to your calendar using this link: gCal import url

excerpt.rendered: The list is back for year 6! that’s right, Community Events, Salesforce events, big Partner events, track them all in ONE PLACE!

meta.jetpack_publicize_message: Check it out, the 2023 version of the Salesforce events gDoc is out!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2022
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you're interested in the Salesforce Events of 2022 find them here. Community, Partner, and Salesforce run all in one place!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2018
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Find out about the 2018 Salesforce Event, when they are and where. Link to the 2018 Salesforce events calendar and form for to submit updates and new events

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Salesforce Events 2020 is live!! That's right Ohana, it wouldn't be my blog if I wasn't talking about events and how we connect and get together as humans.  For real, we get out from behind the keyboard, and even leave the HOUSE!!! I know, it's crazy, but for Ohana,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2021
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Salesforce 2021 events calendar with Community run Dreamin events, bootcamps, Salesforce run events, and more

jetpack-related-posts.title: Join Me When I Present at the World Tour Chicago
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Join me in Chicago 6/15 3 pm, when I present at the Salesforce World Tour on Communities!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seattle WIT User Group May 13th Happy Hour
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Are you a Salesforce woman in technology or a supporter of Salesforce women in technology? Are you located in the Greater Seattle area?  If you answered yes to both of the questions above, you should register for the Seattle Women in Tech User group Happy Hour on Friday, May 13th…
